name: Weather Report
description:
A brief RPG Maker game, made for the Two-Minute Horror Jam. A young researcher burns the midnight oil, with the nightly weather report as his only company. Two endings, some surprises.

Graphics by White Screw Shop, Wato, and First Seed Material. Music and Sound by TAM, MaouDamashii, Karugamo Midi, and CNOC. If you enjoyed this game, why not try Room Escape?
